# NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration.tls(_:serverAddresses:)

**Case**

A DNS-over-TLS resolver configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
case tls(NWEndpoint, serverAddresses: [NWEndpoint])
```

## Discussion

The hostname of the provided endpoint will be used to validate the TLS certificate of the server. See [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7858] for more details. The associated server addresses you provide are hints for which well-known DNS server addresses to use.

## Resolver Types

- **NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration.https(_:serverAddresses:)**: A DNS-over-HTTPS resolver configuration.
